beautyProducts.name: Foundation
beautyProducts.description: Foundation is a cosmetic product used to apply a uniform base of makeup over the face. It is typically applied after cleansing and toning the skin.

beautyProducts.name: Concealer
beautyProducts.description: Concealer is a cosmetic product used to cover up imperfections such as pimples, scars, or acne. It is typically applied after foundation and blended to achieve a natural look.

beautyProducts.name: Mascara
beautyProducts.description: Mascara is a cosmetic product used to lengthen and define the appearance of eyelashes. It is typically applied after eye shadow and before applying eyeliner.

beautyProducts.name: Eyeliner
beautyProducts.description: Eyeliner is a cosmetic product used to outline the contours of the eye. It is typically applied after concealer and mascara.

beautyProducts.name: Eyeshadow
beautyProducts.description: Eyeshadow is a cosmetic product used to apply color to the eye area. It is typically applied after eyeliner and blended to achieve a natural look.

beautyProducts.name: Blush
beautyProducts.description: Blush is a cosmetic product used to apply color to the cheeks. It is typically applied after eyeshadow and blended to achieve a natural look.

beautyProducts.name: Highlighter
beautyProducts.description: Highlighter is a cosmetic product used to add a touch of shimmer or color to specific areas of the face. It is typically applied after blush and eyeshadow.

beautyProducts.name: Lipstick
beautyProducts.description: Lipstick is a cosmetic product used to apply color to the lips. It is typically applied after moisturizing the lips and blending to achieve a natural look.

beautyProducts.name: Lip gloss
beautyProducts.description: Lip gloss is a cosmetic product used to apply a sheer layer of color to the lips. It is typically applied after lipstick and blended to achieve a natural look.

beautyProducts.name: Nail polish
beautyProducts.description: Nail polish is a cosmetic product used to apply color to the nails. It is typically applied after cleaning and filing the nails and allowed to dry.

beautyProducts.name: Hair spray
beautyProducts.description: Hair spray is a cosmetic product used to hold hair in place and add volume or texture. It is typically applied after styling the hair and allowed to dry.

beautyProducts.name: Hair gel
beautyProducts.description: Hair gel is a cosmetic product used to hold hair in place and add volume or texture. It is typically applied after hair spray and allowed to dry.

beautyProducts.name: Hair serum
beautyProducts.description: Hair serum is a cosmetic product used to nourish and repair damaged hair. It is typically applied after shampooing and conditioning the hair and allowed to dry.

beautyProducts.name: Moisturizer
beautyProducts.description: Moisturizer is a cosmetic product used to nourish and hydrate the skin. It is typically applied after cleansing and toning the skin.

beautyProducts.name: Exfoliator
beautyProducts.description: Exfoliator is a cosmetic product used to remove dead skin cells and promote a healthy, glowing complexion. It is typically applied after cleansing and toning the skin.

beautyProducts.name: Toner
beautyProducts.description: Toner is a cosmetic product used to balance the skin tone and reduce redness or irritation. It is typically applied after cleansing the skin and before applying moisturizer.
